snacks.name: Glico Fukami Green Tea Pocky
snacks.description: Crunchy biscuit sticks coated with premium Uji matcha chocolate. The deep green tea flavor balances sweetness with earthy umami notes, creating Japan's most addictive tea-time treat.

snacks.name: Glico Sakura Green Tea Pocky
snacks.description: Limited edition springtime Pocky featuring sakura-matcha fusion. The floral cherry blossom aroma enhances the rich matcha coating, delivering hanami festival flavors in every bite.

snacks.name: Lotte Green Tea Choco Pie
snacks.description: Two soft cake layers sandwiching sweet matcha cream, enrobed in green tea-infused chocolate. The Korean take on matcha snacks offers an extra fluffy texture.

snacks.name: Yuki & Love Green Tea Japanese-Style Mochi
snacks.description: Chewy glutinous rice dough filled with velvety matcha paste. Handcrafted using traditional mochi-making techniques for authentic texture with modern flavor intensity.

snacks.name: Samkwang Almond Green Tea Spread
snacks.description: Creamy almond butter blended with ceremonial-grade matcha. Perfect on toast or as a dessert dip - delivers 5g of matcha powder per 100g jar for potent antioxidant benefits.

snacks.name: Kit Kat Itoen Matcha Latte
snacks.description: Exclusive collaboration with Japan's Itoen tea masters. White chocolate meets matcha latte powder in this creamy wafer bar that melts like your favorite café drink.

snacks.name: Koeda Chocolate Uji Matcha
snacks.description: Branch-shaped chocolate sticks with 15% Uji matcha content. The slender 'koeda' (twig) design allows gradual melting to savor the complex tea flavor profile.

snacks.name: Morinaga Milk Caramel Candy Uji Matcha
snacks.description: Chewy milk caramel infused with matcha powder. The iconic Japanese candy combines buttery sweetness with bitter tea notes for sophisticated flavor layering.

snacks.name: Kit Kat Yokubari Double Chocolates Dark Matcha & Original
snacks.description: Two-layered matcha experience: dark chocolate base topped with matcha-infused white chocolate. The 'Yokubari' (greedy) series satisfies intense matcha cravings.

snacks.name: Lotte MERCER bis Choco Pie Uji Matcha
snacks.description: Premium version of Korea's favorite choco pie with 30% more matcha cream. The airy cake and thick filling create cloud-like texture with robust tea flavor.

drinks.name: Starbucks Premium Mixes Matcha Latte 4pcs
drinks.description: Keep yourself warm during rainy days with a cup of high-quality matcha latte! These coffee sticks come from the Starbucks premium blend series. Each stick-shaped pack contains carefully selected matcha which once hot water is added, transforms into a smooth foamy drink that has a deep and creamy taste!

drinks.name: Cat Matcha Latte Powder Sachet
drinks.description: This powdered sachet showcases a cute cat barista! Use it to make your own nice cup of matcha latte. Just mix it in with 200-220 ml of water to make your latte! You can make it even richer by using milk.

drinks.name: Blendy Stick - Matcha Ore
drinks.description: Make your own cup of matcha with this box of tea packets! Each packet can be used to make hot or cold matcha. To make hot matcha just add one packet to 180 ml of hot water. If you want cold matcha, mix one packet with 90 ml of water and then add 5 to 6 ice cubes.

drinks.name: Kataoka Tsujiri Matcha Latte
drinks.description: Enjoy a cup of hot or iced matcha latte made with fragrant Uji matcha that’s carefully selected by a tea master! The box has four packets and you can either dissolve this instant matcha latte powder in either water or even milk.

drinks.name: Blendy Stick - Matcha Ore
drinks.description: Make your own cup of matcha with this box of tea packets! Each packet can be used to make hot or cold matcha. To make hot matcha just add one packet to 180 ml of hot water. If you want cold matcha, mix one packet with 90 ml of water and then add 5 to 6 ice cubes.

drinks.name: MUJI Instant Matcha Latte Bag
drinks.description: Make yourself a cup of milky tea in an instant with this bag of powdered matcha latte! It’s made with rich milk and the finest Uji matcha that’s sourced from Kyoto Prefecture. This was also created specifically for MUJI — a popular Japanese lifestyle brand that's known around the world!

drinks.name: Mitsu Norin Nitto Matcha Au Lait
drinks.description: Make yourself a cup of delicious uji matcha matcha au lait with this pack of powder sticks! Each stick makes for a cup of delicious matcha latte. Just mix the powder in 120 ml of hot water and you're ready to go.

drinks.name: Blendy Café Latory Rich Matcha Latte
drinks.description: This box of powder sticks makes for a special matcha latte that goes perfectly with your favorite slice of cake. Each stick combines the taste of bittersweet match from Japan and the mellow richness of milk!

drinks.name: Nami Okumidori First Harvest Matcha
drinks.description: This rare and super high quality Okumidori ceremonial (first harvest) is a single-origin matcha originating from Kagoshima, Japan. Perfect for your daily matcha ritual: incredible vibrant green color with a creamy and aromatic flavor! It is one of the most prized USDA organic first harvest matchas available.

drinks.name: Nami Strawberry Matcha
drinks.description: Name a better combo than strawberry + matcha (you can’t!) This tin of Nami Matcha has the delicious flavor of real strawberries paired with first harvest, organic matcha. This matcha is sourced from Kagoshima, Japan and is for the perfect morning or mid-day pick-me-up! Made with 100% natural strawberry flavor and no added sugar!

bakery.name: Matcha Almond Croissants
bakery.description: Burnt cheesecake with Kyoto matcha swirls. The creamy interior features a striking marbled effect, while the caramelized crust adds bitter-sweet contrast. Serves 6-8.

bakery.name: Matcha Mille Crepe Cake
bakery.description: This gorgeous 16-layer matcha mille crepe cake is made with thin matcha crepes layered with matcha whipped cream. It's a light and delicate cake that looks and tastes like it came from a bakery!

bakery.name: Matcha Checkboard Cookies
bakery.description: These matcha checkerboard cookies are soft and buttery with a stunning checkerboard pattern. They have a lovely matcha flavour that's perfect for matcha lovers

bakery.name: Matcha Roll Cake (Swiss Roll)
bakery.description: This matcha roll cake is made with a soft and fluffy matcha cake and it's filled with matcha whipped cream for double the matcha green tea flavour.

bakery.name: Matcha Scones
bakery.description: These matcha scones are soft and fluffy with crispy edges and sweet matcha icing on top. No dry or dense scones here! They're a fun matcha green tea twist on classic scones that make an easy breakfast or snack.

bakery.name: Matcha Crinkle Cookies
bakery.description: These matcha crinkle cookies are soft, fluffy, and melt in your mouth. They're packed with matcha flavour with a dusting of powdered sugar on the outside for that classic crinkle cookie look.

bakery.name: Matcha Basque Cheesecake
bakery.description: This matcha basque cheesecake is a green tea spin on the famous burnt cheesecake. It's caramelized and scorched on the outside with an ultra-creamy interior and fresh whipped cream on top.

bakery.name: Matcha Madelines
bakery.description: These soft and fluffy matcha madeleines are the perfect little mini cakes. They're made with plenty of matcha flavour with a stunning shiny matcha white chocolate shell.

bakery.name: Matcha Milk Bread Turtles
bakery.description: A certified matcha mart treat. Make your day better with these cute and delicious turtles made with a rich chocolate crust on top of a soft matcha bread

bakery.name: Matcha Tiramisu
bakery.description: This matcha tiramisu is a delicious twist on a classic Italian dessert with layers of creamy matcha mascarpone cream and soft, spongey ladyfingers soaked in matcha. It all comes together in a heavenly, rich, and decadent bite with plenty of green tea flavour.
